channel.title: [317 PI] New Shop Problem
channel.description:
I got the shop open! But now the shop will not allow me to buy or sell the items from it. I am frustrated...... :/ And it says the items price is 0. But I changed the price in Prices.txt and Item.cfg.
FIXED but new problem! Look above! okay, I'm not a noob to Java, and I am actually stumped. I added the npc to the spawn list. The NPC appears. I went into the ActionHandler and added [code=java] case 659: c.getShops().openShop(7); break; [/code] which would be the shop Party Pete is to open. and I went into the shops config and added shop number, name and all the items. I compile and get absolutely NO errors. And Restart the server, and then try to trade him, it doesnt do anything. but in the CMD window for the server it says [code] First Click NPC : 659 [/code] but when I open a working shop... the CMD doesn't print anything. I am stumped, frustrated and just got out of work. I have been looking through this for 2 god damn days. Please help me open up this shop :/
I'm not asking for spoon feeding, but I'm asking for minimum of hints...

item.title: [317 PI] New Shop Problem

@sssylasss wrote:

nope 60 errors

didn’t look if you have player owned shops or not, but that could be the cause, you can comment them out or just rip the getItemShopValue methods etc.

I set them to 2.147B… Like donator shop… But. its not working, you got skype? bryann.turner. add me.

item.title: [317 PI] New Shop Problem
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

back in the shops file, make sure that the buy and sell is set to 2

like this:

shop = 50 Rares Shop 2 2 1037 5
^ shop id ^ shop name ^ buying is true ^ selling is true ^ item id ^ amount

Read full topic

item.title: [317 PI] New Shop Problem
item.dc:creator: @1800getk0ed 1800getk0ed
item.description:
@1800getk0ed wrote:

I got the shop open! But now the shop will not allow me to buy or sell the items from it. I am frustrated…
And it says the items price is 0. But I changed the price in Prices.txt and Item.cfg.

FIXED but new problem! Look above!
okay, I’m not a noob to Java, and I am actually stumped. I added the npc to the spawn list. The NPC appears.
I went into the ActionHandler and added

case 659:
       c.getShops().openShop(7);
break;

which would be the shop Party Pete is to open.
and I went into the shops config and added shop number, name and all the items.
I compile and get absolutely NO errors. And Restart the server, and then try to trade him, it doesnt do anything.
but in the CMD window for the server it says

First Click NPC : 659

but when I open a working shop… the CMD doesn’t print anything.
I am stumped, frustrated and just got out of work. I have been looking through this for 2 god damn days.
Please help me open up this shop

I’m not asking for spoon feeding, but I’m asking for minimum of hints…

Read full topic
